unittitle_ssm: New York Customs House accounting records and John Jay copy of Federalist Paper No. 2
abstract_ssm: The collection includes the receipts and accounts of the Province of New York Customs House (1704-1709) and a handwritten copy of the Federalist Paper No. 2 by John Jay (1787). Although the two items were accessioned as a single unit, the connection between the two is unknown.
subject_ssm: Customs administration |z New York (State) |z New York
